name: PEACH YOGURT PIE
ingredients:
- 1 can of sliced peaches 
- 2 containers of fruit flavored yogurt  
- 3 cups of whipped cream (of 1 carton of Cool Whip)  
- 1 graham cracker crust*
instructions:
- Combine the sliced peaches and the yogurt. 
- Fold in the whipped cream and mix well. 
- Spoon the mixture into the crust and freeze for 4 hours. 
- Remove from freezer and let the pie sit in the refrigerator for 30 minutes before serving.

name: GRAHAM CRACKER CRUST
ingredients:
- 1 1/2 cups of graham cracker crumbs  
- 2 tablespoons of sugar  
- 6 tablespoons of butter (melted)
instructions:
- Preheat oven to 350 degrees 
- Combine the graham cracker crumbs, sugar, and melted butter.  
- Press the mixture into  a 9-inch pie pan  
- Bake for 10 minutes at 350 degrees.  
- Remove from oven, cool, and fill the crust with any type of filling.

name: STRAWBERRY CHEESECAKE
ingredients:
- 3 packages of (8 ounce) cream cheese 
- 1 cup of sugar  
- 5 eggs  
- 11/2 teaspoons of vanilla 
- 1/2  carton of strawberries 
- 1 (unbaked) graham cracker crust*
instructions:
- Preheat oven to 350 degrees  
- Beat the cream cheese and eggs together while adding one egg at a time.  
- Add the sugar and vanilla.  
- Pour the mixture into a graham cracker crust.  
- Bake for 1 hour at 350 degrees.  
- Remove from oven, let cool, and refrigerate until ready to serve.

name: APPLE CARROT CAKE
ingredients:
- 1 package of carrot cake mix 
- 1 cup vegetable oil  
- 3 eggs 
- 1 cup of applesauce
instructions:
- Preheat oven to 350 degrees 
- Combine the carrot cake mix, eggs, and oil and mix well. 
- Add the applesauce and mix well.  
- Pour into a pre-greased pan and bake at 350 for 35 minutes. 
- Remove from oven, let cool, and serve.

name: FRUIT COCKTAIL CAKE
ingredients:
- 1 can of fruit cocktail (undrained) 
- 4 cups of flour 
- 2 cups of sugar 
- 2 teaspoons of baking soda  
- (Optional Frosting: 1 cup of sugar, 1 can of evaporated milk, 1/2  cup butter, 1 teaspoon of vanilla)
instructions:
- Preheat oven to 300 degrees 
- Mix the fruit cocktail, flour, sugar, and baking soda.  
- Pour mixture into a greased pan.  
- Bake at 300 for 45 minutes.  
- (For optional frosting: Cook all ingredients over medium heat until thick. Spread over cake.)

name: PEANUT BUTTER COOKIES
ingredients:
- 1 cup of peanut butter  
- 1 egg  
- 1 cup of sugar  
- 1 teaspoon of vanilla
instructions:
- Mix the peanut butter, egg, sugar, and vanilla together.  
- Form the mixture into 1-inch balls.  
- Press the 1-inch balls flat onto a greased cookie sheet using a fork.  
- Bake for 10 minutes at 350 degrees.    
- Remove from oven, cool, and serve.

name: FRUIT PARFAIT
ingredients:
- 1 can of any fruit or fruit mix (drained) or 1 container of fresh fruit  
- 2 (6-ounce) containers of yogurt (any flavor)  
- 4 cups of granola or any cereal
instructions:
- In four different bowls, begin to add the layers of ingredients  
- For the first layer, add 1/2 of the can of fruit (or 1/2 cup of fresh fruit) per bowl. 
- For the second layer, add 1/2 of the container of yogurt per bowl.  
- For the last layer, add 1 cup of the granola or cereal to each bowl. 
- Refrigerate and serve.
